name: height
description: Height of the SVG (number interpreted as px). Defaults to 80.

name: width
description: Width of the SVG (number interpreted as px). Defaults to 80.

name: dnaColorOne
description: The primary color of the DNA loader strands. Defaults to 'rgba(233, 12, 89, 0.51)'.

name: dnaColorTwo
description: The secondary color of the DNA loader strands. Defaults to '#46dff0'.

name: ariaLabel
description: Accessible label announced to screen readers. Defaults to 'dna-loading'.

name: wrapperStyle
description: Inline style object applied to the wrapper element.

name: wrapperClass
description: CSS class applied to the wrapper for custom styling.

name: visible
description: When false, the loader is not rendered. Defaults to true.
